H3.text: who plays the dad in girl meets world. Ben Savage

A4.text: He played the lead role of Cory Matthews on the ABC sitcom Boy Meets World (1993–2000) and its Disney Channel sequel Girl Meets World (2014–2017).

A5.text: In addition to his on‑screen role, Savage directed 10 episodes.
